SAINT.Name: Thursday of the Third Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 3rd Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: If Thou shouldest mark iniquities, O Lover of mankind, what hope of salvation is there for us? But as Thou art compassionate, from on high send down Thy help upon Thy people, O Lord.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: O God, in Thy name save me
and in Thy strength do Thou judge me.
SEXTE.STICHOS: O God, hearken unto my prayer, give ear unto the words of my mouth.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 7th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: unto my prayer, and disdain not my supplication.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Attend unto me, and hear me.
